variables.label: Organizr Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/causefx/organizr/tags

instructions.end: Organizr has been deployed! Access it at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain and set up your dashboard with all your services.

description: Application organizer and dashboard. Bring all your services together in one beautiful, customizable interface with tabs and SSO support.
